custom_css: h1 {margin-bottom: 24px; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; font-weight: 600; color: black; text-align: center;}
.button {background: #1f5da0; color: white; padding: 15px 40px; font-weight: 600; transition: transform 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease; overflow: hidden; text-decoration: none;}

settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
tr {
  color: #1f5da0;
  font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif;
}
td>a {
color: #1f5da0;
  font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif;
}
a.underlined-link, #checkout {
  background: #1f5da0;
  color: white;
  padding: 15px 40px;
  font-weight: 600;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-decoration: none;
}
a.underlined-link:hover, checkout:hover {
  background-color: #2a5cb8;
color: white;
  transform: scale(1.05);
}
.h4, span.price, small {
color: #222222;
  font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif;
}
#Remove-1 {
height: 60px;
margin-top: 8px;
}
:root, .color-scheme-1 {
--color-foreground: 31, 93, 160;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 749px) {
  .cart-item {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
align-items: center;
  }
}
</style>
